hero.lead: A compact timeline of pivotal achievements that shaped connectivity, policy, and digital adoption — captured through key years, categories, and their impact.

image.alt: Collage of towers, fiber spools, and device silhouettes

milestones.title: National IX Testbed
milestones.text: First neutral internet exchange pilot linking universities and ISPs to improve local routing.

milestones.title: e-Gov Identity APIs (v1)
milestones.text: Early programmatic access for verification use-cases in banking and telecom onboarding.

milestones.title: Universal Service 2.0
milestones.text: Reoriented subsidies toward fiber backhaul and school connectivity in remote districts.

milestones.title: 4G Nationwide Expansion
milestones.text: Commercial LTE rollouts accelerate smartphone adoption and mobile broadband usage.

milestones.title: Open Data Portal
milestones.text: Government datasets released under a permissive license to spur civic tech and research.

milestones.title: Digital Payments Interop
milestones.text: Real-time rails allow wallet-to-bank transfers and merchant QR acceptance at scale.

milestones.title: Satellite Gateways Authorized
milestones.text: High-throughput satellite gateways permitted for backhaul and hard-to-reach communities.

milestones.title: Cloud First Policy
milestones.text: Guidelines for public workloads with security baselines and domestic region preference.

milestones.title: Open Banking Sandbox
milestones.text: Fintechs test secure data-sharing with banks for new credit, PFM, and payments use-cases.

milestones.title: Gov Services Super-App
milestones.text: A unified mobile entry point for licensing, certificates, bills, and case tracking.

milestones.title: 5G Pilot Corridors
milestones.text: City corridors designated for 5G trials in logistics hubs and industrial parks.

milestones.title: AI Compute Cluster (Public Research)
milestones.text: Shared national cluster prioritizes research access and public-interest datasets.

cards.title: Community fiber cooperatives trialed in two provinces.
Spectrum roadmap published with three-year visibility.
National QR standard launched; small merchants onboarded.
Gov cloud region goes live with sovereign controls.
Affordable smartphone program with installment support.
School connectivity + digital literacy packs for teachers.
Redundant coastal routes added to mitigate outages.
Private 5G trials in two industrial parks.
Public research cluster seeds local AI applications.

points.text: Scale private 5G and neutral host models for logistics and manufacturing.
Target sub-100 ms median latency to major clouds via diverse routes.
Expand device affordability + school connectivity to boost rural usage.
Operationalize open banking and verifiable credentials for SMEs.
